item.title: Linux
item.description: Section content # How to check if dithering is present or not (Intel Arc and Intel iGPU 11th generation and above): the method using hardware register reading. How to check if dithering is present or not (Intel GPU/iGPU): method using reading /sys/kernel/debug/dri/X/i915_display_info. How to check if dithering is present or not (Intel Arc and Intel iGPU 11th generation and above): a method using hardware register reading # For Intel Arc and Intel iGPU (11th generation and above), you can check for dithering by reading register 0x70030.
